spec:
Can we make additions to the backend to:

a) log every api request/response including payloads to debug
b) validate each incoming request against the dto/schema via an annotation or globally (update auth controller)
c) install a global error handler that will return an nice error if something weird happened
commitMessage:
Added request/response logging, validation and error handling improvements:

1. Added request/response logging interceptor to log all API requests and responses
2. Enhanced validation on DTOs using class-validator decorators
3. Added global error handler to standardize error responses
4. Updated logger to better handle structured logging with metadata
